alert.note: Alert for Boise Mountains; Upper Weiser River; West Central Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 10 at 4:36AM MST until January 10 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Boise
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches in the Upper Weiser River Basin. The West Central Mountains and Boise Mountains will see 3 to 6 inches, except up to 8 inches over higher mountains. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...West Central Mountains, Boise Mountains and Upper Weiser River zones. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Boise Mountains; Upper Weiser River; West Central Mountains
